metadata.title: PM welcomes SC decision on reserved seats

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 27 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Friday welcomed the decision of the Supreme Courtas constitutional bench regarding reserved seats. In a statement, he congratulated the governmentas legal team and appreciated it for the tireless work. He said the correct interpretation of the law in the decision established the supremacy of the Constitution and law. He urged the opposition to work together with the government and play its positive role for development and prosperity of the country.
